content.rendered:
Monday, November 25, 2024
Today is a “C” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • There are NO after school buses today, Monday 11/25.
  • Science club will not meet today 11/25. Next meeting will be Monday Dec 2.
  • Picture Re-Take & Make-Up Days for students and staff will be Monday, November 25th and Tuesday, November 26th. Students should go during their scheduled Flex Class. Staff can go anytime between 10:00 -2:00. Location for Re-Take /Make-Up days will be the Auditorium Lobby.
  • Girl’s 7th and 8th grade modified Basketball tryouts are Monday 11/25 and Tuesday 11/26 3pm-5pm in the back gym.
  • Attention 8th grade Québec travelers, roommate forms are due to Madame Murray on or before Tuesday, 11/26.
  • On Monday November 25 our Winter Donation Drive will begin. If you want to donate toiletries like deodorant and toothbrushes we are also taking gently used coats or new hats and gloves. You can donate these items in anyone of the 4 boxes in the school. There is one in every spring.

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
